attributes.action: Have a post Brexit general election and introduce proportional representation.
attributes.additional_details:
Our current government did not gain power from a a majority vote, therefore they are not truly representing the people of Britain. 
 
As more younger people start to become more interested in politics and their future, so the political spectrum will change and the wishes of all people who voted should be heard equally in parliament. 

This policy is about putting the interest of our citizens first, to make sure the government can discuss and compromise to address our needs correctly and fairly.
attributes.background:
The brexit referendum has created a political divide that must be recognized and acknowleged by our government. 

The PM's resignation should be followed by the first general election for a government formed by proportional representation to ensure that the people's voices are heard equally.
